statements: DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE organization_name = 'Company ABC';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp' AND compliance_level > 2;
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE country = 'USA' AND recommendation_text LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 10 AND implementation_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE id = 100 AND implementation_status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE implementation_status = 'Not Implemented' AND compliance_level = 'Low';
DELETE FROM human_rights_bodies WHERE country = 'United States';
